Exception Summary
RDBMSException Layer Exception for RDBMS data set provider.
TableAlreadyExistsException Indicates a table already exists in the RDBMS internal model.
 

Package org.middleheaven.persistance.db Description

RDBM based persistence support. Implements the DataSet Provider mechanics for JDBC based RDBMs.
